text:
@realDonaldTrump Andrew Cuomo: “I am sure there will be political consequences. I had one individual say this state will never elect me again. Frankly, I don’t care. I did the right thing and I am proud of it.”

THIS is what we need in Washington right now!!

#COVID19🦠
#PresidentCuomo🇺🇸 https://t.co/NHjSju2x1T
